Package memory_game_client.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • memory_game_client.controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the client application.

    Executes CRUD operations on MySQL Database.
    In addition, acts as bridge between board panel and score panel.

      • userRegistration

        public int userRegistration​(RegistrationEvent registrationEvent)
        Sends user registration information to database for further processing.
        Parameters:
        registrationEvent - object which holds information about the user
        Returns:
        Database response.
        Code -1 is returned when connection to database could not be established
        Code 0 is returned when username is already taken
        Code 1 is returned when registration is successful

      • userLogin

        public int userLogin​(LogInEvent logInEvent)
        Sends user login information to database for further processing.
        Parameters:
        logInEvent - object which holds information about the user
        Returns:
        Database response.
        Code -1 is returned when connection to database could not be established
        Code 0 is returned when username or password is wrong
        Code 1 is returned when login is successful

      • getScoresForUser

        public void getScoresForUser​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> storage)
        Passes on HashMap to the database. Database then fills the HashMap with user's scores along with date and time each score was achieved.
        Parameters:
        storage - HashMap in which user's scores are stored

      • gameFinished

        public void gameFinished​(int performanceScore)
        Displays the information about achieved result on the ScorePanel upon finishing single player game.
        Attempts to insert achieved result to the database.
        Parameters:
        performanceScore - achieved result to be displayed and inserted

      • gameFinishedMultiplayer

        public void gameFinishedMultiplayer​(int player)
        Displays information about whom won the multiplayer game on the ScorePanel.
        Parameters:
        player - A player that won the game.
        Value 1 represents the client. Value 2 represents the opponent.

      • getHighScores

        public void getHighScores​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> storage)
        Fetches High scores of all the users from the database in String, Integer pairs where String represents the name of the player and Integer is the score.
        Parameters:
        storage - HashMap used to store the results

      • sendOpenedPair

        public void sendOpenedPair​(int[] openedPair)
        Sends a pair of int values (which represent the opened card pair) stored inside an int[] array
        Parameters:
        openedPair - int pair to send

      • setOpenedPair

        public void setOpenedPair​(int[] openedPair)
        Sets the provided pair of cards represented as a pair of ints as a currently opened pair.
        Parameters:
        openedPair - int pair to set
